an4.212:4.1: “Mendicants, someone with four qualities is cast down to hell.
an4.212:4.3: Bad conduct by way of body, speech, and mind, and wrong view.
an4.212:4.4: Someone with these four qualities is cast down to hell.
an4.212:5.1: Someone with four qualities is raised up to heaven.
an4.212:5.3: Good conduct by way of body, speech, and mind, and right view.
an4.212:5.4: Someone with these four qualities is raised up to heaven.”
